title: It's tolerable when you instalock in your champ.
body:
Annoying, but tolerable. But it's absolutely frustrating when you say nothing in the champ select, lock in your champ while everyone scrambles to figure out what role you choose and pick based around you. Only to see you be the first one to type in the game screen:

Vayne: Fuck you Katarina, I am mid.

It was interesting supporting a Katarina bot lane as Braum. Thanks Vayne :)

tl;dr Good communication wins games (along with vision) and good communication starts with YOU.
